column1: Table A-251: Total 2014 N2O Emissions (Direct and Indirect) from Agricultural Soil Management by State (MMT CO2 Eq.)
a Emissions from non-manure organic N inputs for crops not simulated by DAYCENT were not estimated (NE) at the state level.
b Emissions from sewage sludge applied to grasslands and were not estimated (NE) at the state level
c N2O emissions are not reported for Hawaii except from cropland organic soils.
